name: Jay Widner
text: Will not being going there again. They changed our order 3 times because they were out of things. Then charged us what we originally ordered. Do Not Go to Noble Pizza Hut after 8 p.m. There was a lady there with 3 kids and she talked on her phone the entire time while her kids ran around. I do not recommend this place.
